case.name: Megumin Terrorism
case.description: Megumin talks about that time she terrorized an encampment of monsters for days.

case.name: Megumin No Bra
case.description: Megumin reveals she isn't wearing a bra.

case.name: Megumin asks about shaving
case.description: Megumin is confused after seeing a woman with a shaved groin and asks what that is about.

case.name: Megumin / Yuelia joint stripping
case.description: Yuelia uses her magic to remove Megumin's dress at Megumin's request (There are 3 different versions of this line, so make sure to react to them all)

case.name: Megumin staff implication
case.description: Megumin refuses to tell Panty if she gets herself off with her staff, implying she might.

case.name: After Finished Casual Conversation
case.description: Megumin is a bit awkward after finishing, quite a few of the lines can be reacted to if you so wish.

case.name: Casual Conversation 3
case.description: Megumin implies that you have to catch vegetables with a net in her world

case.name: Casual Conversation 4
case.description: Megumin talks about the golems in her village

case.name: Casual Conversation 5
case.description: Megumin asks people what the biggest monster they've killed was

case.name: Casual Conversation 6
case.description: Megumin asks if anyone has played this game before
